thread.title: Kylie shares throwback bikini snap with Kim and Khloe | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kylie shares throwback bikini snap with Kim and Khloe | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.Com
title: Kylie shares throwback bikini snap with Kim and Khloe | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Seemingly having some trouble getting in the perfect position for sunbathing, Kim was seen on all fours on her lounger clad in a tiny beige two-piece. Flattering her tanned complexion, the scanty garment offered a look at her impeccably toned abs and jaw dropping posterior. Wearing her raven coloured locks loose and poker straight, the mother-of-two also donned a pair of reflective gold shades. In another sizzling snap, Kim was seen reclining on the pool edge, whilst her famous figure was exhibited in a black two-piece. Costa chica! Flaunting her famous derriere, the reality starlet, 36, sizzled in a series of skimpy bikinis that showed off her phenomenal figure A saucy snapshot taken from behind showed that the garment was thong style, ensuring her best asset would be on full display. Kim wasn't alone in all her snaps, sharing a series of sweet pictures with husband Kanye West. Clad in a plunging white jumpsuit, the brunette bombshell showed off her ample bust, whilst a gold choker drew further attention to her decotellage. Cheeky! A saucy snapshot taken from behind showed that her swimsuit was thong style, ensuring her best asset would be on full display Brunette bombshell: Wearing her raven coloured locks loose and poker straight, the mother-of-two also donned a pair of reflective gold shades Kim recently heaped praise on her newly-blonde beau after he held another runway show for his Yeezy collection at New York Fashion Week. She tweeted: 'So proud of my baby for his amazing show today! It was so good! I'm so SO proud of him!!! #yeezyseason5.' The show was attended by multiple celebrities, including Kylie Jenner, boyfriend Tyga, LaLa Anthony and Anna Wintour. Two's company: Kim wasn't alone in all her snaps, sharing a series of sweet pictures with husband Kanye West, seemingly just enjoying some downtime together Busting out: Clad in a plunging white jumpsuit, the brunette bombshell showed off her ample bust, whilst a gold choker drew further attention to her decotellage Cute couple: In the snapshots, Kim was seen beaming at her husband as they settled down in a room that appeared to be in the midst of a major renovation Hop to it! The pair gazed into each other's eyes with love as Kim ran towards her man Bit of all white! Kim's famous posterior was also highlighted by the chic cream jumpsuit Party in the park: The pair appeared to be caught candidly by the camera as they enjoyed some time outside together Got your nose! Kim appeared to be in a playful mood, taking little swipes at her husband This season appeared to have a slightly more intimate feel, as previous seasons have been held outside and in stadium-like venues. Kanye, who has been criticized for his clothing in the past, did not seem to take the words to heart. He presented a similar collection of ultra-simple lounge-wear mixed with military-inspired pieces. Proud wife: Kim recently heaped praise on her newly-blonde beau after he held another runway show for his Yeezy collection at New York Fashion Week Read more: Share or comment on this article 168
